text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
The student council's making a new pamphlet? 
I don't really get it, but I'll try to help out!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Thanks. I know I just asked for your help, but what do you 
think of when I say a "livelier side of the student council?"

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
I'm guessing that it will be more fun, but honestly, 
I don't really have a specific idea in mind.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Hmmm. Well, wouldn't it at least have more races?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: … Ha ha. That's a very you answer. Sure.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Really? Did I actually get it right?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Do you have any ideas other than races?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
That wasn't it? Other than races? Hmmm? 
Well, I'm not the best outside of racing…

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
But I mean, aren't there lots of ways to be "high-spirited"? 
Like, you know how you would want to relax in a different 
spot depending on the situation?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
"Spots," you say? That might work. 
A "high-spirit spot" sounds like an interesting idea.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
I see! If you ask some others about something like that 
I'm sure a lot of people will have a place in mind.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! In that case…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
And that's everyone you've gathered. But still, I wasn't 
expecting you to work so quickly in just two days.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
It's always best to be ahead of the game, right? 
Well, it was all for making the pamphlet.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Turbo and Nature, thanks for agreeing to work with us! 
I know you just joined, but let's give it our all!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Yay! Let's all go on a tour of all the spots around here!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
H-how did I get dragged into this!? I just 
happened to be walking around with Turbo!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Still, with the president, C.B., and Ace all here. This is quite an 
impressive group to say the least…

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Well, let's head out. There're quite a 
few high-spirit spots to check out.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Me, me, me! I wanna pick! I wanna pick the first spot!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Take this and this and this! Yeah, I'm the best!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Come on! Can you at least shoot some of the enemies 
besides the boss, Turbo!? Oh, Ms. Rudolf, can you take 
the ones on the right?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Understood! It would appear we are surrounded on all fronts. 
The battlefield truly is a cruel mistress.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ha ha. Rudolf is pretty into this. This is new.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Oh, they're so close to winning. Go, go!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Yes! We beat the whole game!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whew. Well, someone's excited. But still, can we even 
put something like the arcade in the pamphlet?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's fine. Seeing Turbo in such high spirits, 
to her, this fit the criteria perfectly.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
You see, I've been giving it my all at training and at races! 
Afterwards, I get super tired and come here!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I have so much fun playing around that I can feel my engine 
heat up! And then I'm all like whoosh when I run!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Play! Have fun! Race! Play again! That's the 
Turbo way: the ultimate high-spirited loop!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I see. You've been quite active haven't you. 
Well, in any case, I will choose the next location.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But man, we went all the way from the arcade to the museum. 
I really can't guess what we're going to do next…

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
Yes, the gap between the two locations is quite large. 
But still, it seems everyone is enjoying themselves.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
Honestly, at first, I thought, "Really? Studying?" 
But, Rudolf, having you there to help explain things 
made everything a lot easier to understand.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
The horsegirls of old were something else! 
Still, if we raced, I'd beat them though.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
I totally get what you mean! Especially "The Escape 
Specialists That Made History" exhibition. Just reading 
their victory interviews gave me chills!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text:
I want to be just like them and make a name 
for myself… Alright, that got me fired up!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Me too, me too! Let's become legendary escape specialists!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I'm glad to see you two were so moved. I get 
the same feeling every time I come here too.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The horsegirls immortalized in history motivate me to 
continue running. Perhaps they too are what give me life.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text:
So, we've been to the arcade and the museum. Might as well 
continue this variety trend we've got here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
In that case, umm, if you don't mind, 
I would like to show everyone my spot.
